feed.title: Combined summary - Bitcoin intro and talks in Berlin (11th May at 20:00)

entry.title: Combined summary - Bitcoin intro and talks in Berlin (11th May at 20:00)
entry.summary: C-Base, a hacker and maker space based in Berlin, is planning an event that centers around peer-to-peer (p2p) technologies. The event is scheduled for the 11th of an unspecified month and will include a section on Bitcoin starting at 20:00. Interested individuals who want to give a talk can email Genjix at genjix@riseup.net to be added to the schedule.This event may be of particular interest to those who are interested in p2p technologies and their applications. As the use of Bitcoin continues to grow, it is becoming increasingly important to understand how the technology works and its potential impact on various industries.C-Base, which was founded in 1995, is a well-known community space in Berlin that focuses on technology, science, and art. It has been at the forefront of the city's hacker and maker scene for over two decades. The organization hosts regular events, workshops, and discussions that explore various aspects of technology and innovation.The upcoming event on p2p technologies and Bitcoin is expected to draw a diverse crowd of tech enthusiasts, entrepreneurs, academics, and researchers. It provides an excellent opportunity to network, share ideas, and learn from experts in the field.Overall, this event offers a unique chance to gain insights into the world of p2p technologies and Bitcoin. With the rising importance of these technologies in today's digital landscape, attending this event could prove to be a valuable investment for those looking to stay ahead of the curve.
